title: Day 1 — Early Morning to Present

entries.description: Woke at Broken Tankard Inn. Brana Korr delivered intel re: Vault Watch silence. No signs of forced entry or blood. Assigned to investigate via Roeg.
Identified only known parties: Roeg Tharn (Captain), Brana Korr (Innkeeper), Courier Boy (name unknown). Confirmed minimal awareness to avoid public unrest.
Conceived infiltration plan. Smuggled self and Nym Bell (inn server) into Guard Barracks inside two sealed ale barrels. Delivery disguised as ale resupply.
Arrival at Guard Barracks. Secured in storage room with no interference. Presumed Roeg compliance.
Emerged. Found: Guard uniforms, short sword, keyring (3 keys), ration stockpile. Nym unaware of true mission until exit.
Foraged remaining food. Acquired: 1 hardbread (eaten), 1 goat cheese wedge (eaten), 2 apples (1 remaining). Hunger now full.
Began documentation. Current status: disguised, armed, prepared. No signs of external tampering.

nextAction: Proceed to East Vault Watchpost. Objective: Locate missing guards, assess potential Vault activity, retrieve proof.
